plan: Plan: Enter a strong BUY tranche of ~0.1746 BTC (~$18.7k) using a MARKET order to capture current momentum while staying under risk caps. Cap daily actions at 10 trades; maintain at most 3 open limit orders (start with 0 open now). If price advances, consider laddered entries/exits via LIMIT orders later; monitor for price moves >1.5 ATR against entry to invalidate. Maintain risk controls and reassess every 4 hours with updated data.
